response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and the expertise that went into its creation. Considering its unparalleled value, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $10,500. I believe this represents a fantastic deal for you, given the product's capabilities and benefits. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10500}
